name: Lego Dimensions: Nya Fun Pack
summary: Let creativity be your guide to a building and gaming adventure – journey through unexpected worlds and team up with unlikely allies on a quest to defeat the evil Lord Vortech. Build this skilled Ninja hero and add her to a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Place Nya on the Lego Toy Pad to bring her to life in the game, then activate her special Spinjitzu, Acrobat, Stealth and Laser Deflector abilities to solve puzzles and take down rivals. Use the Samurai Mech to defeat rivals and rebuild it into a Samurai Shooter and Soaring Samurai Mech for upgraded in-game powers!
